amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 118-12 to revise the bill to include the right to timely notice of any major cyberattack against their child's school that may have compromised student or parent information.
amendment.purpose: Amendment revises the bill to include the right to timely notice of any major cyberattack against their child's school that may have compromised student or parent information.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green (TN) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 5 (Roll no. 154).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Green (TN).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Green (TN) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 5 (Roll no. 154).
